channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Trek lance ses Charter+ : des vélos électriques ultra polyvalents à partir de 3 000 euros
item.description: Trek dévoile Charter+, une nouvelle gamme de vélos électriques haut de gamme. Composée de 18 nouveaux modèles, elle mise sur le confort et la connectivité avec comme promesse de faciliter aussi bien les déplacements du quotidien que les sorties plus sportives.

item.title: ‘That makes no sense to me at all’: Jony Ive rejects Tesla-style 'giant iPads' and reveals button-heavy Ferrari Luce cockpit
item.description: Ferrari has revealed some of the interior of its Luce EV, while designer Jony Ive takes a swipe at touchscreens.

item.title: UK takes 'light touch' approach to regulating Apple and Google's app stores
item.description: Last year the UK declared that Apple and Google were a duopoly with "strategic market status" in the mobile platforms market, making them subject to special regulations. However, the UK's Competition and Markets Authority (CMA) will not regulate Google and Apple's app stores like the EU has done. Rather, government plans to enforce its own digital markets rules in a "pragmatic" way by accepting "commitments" from Apple and Google in areas like app rankings, the CMA announced. Google and Apple agreed to work with the CMA to address concerns on the following matters: app review, app ranking, us...

item.title: New Deep-Sea Mollusk Has an Iron Tongue and Hitchhiking Worms That Eat Its Poo
item.description: Meet Ferreiraella populi, a weird mollusk discovered in Japan. Keep reading to find out how Rihanna is involved.

item.title: Siri’s new Gemini-powered brain is almost here – find out how to try it in iOS 26.4 this month
item.description: The first stages of Siri's AI overhaul should arrive with iOS 26.4, and the first beta of that is reportedly just weeks away.

item.title: I’ve watched the Virgin River season 7 trailer more times than I can count — and one unexpected storyline already feels like rage bait
item.description: Netflix has dropped the first Virgin River season 7 trailer and it’s total rage bait, with every storyline first-look is more infuriating than the last.

item.title: Toyota and Pony.ai start mass producing robotaxis for China
item.description: The first Pony.ai bZ4X robotaxi, made in partnership with Toyota, has just rolled off the production line and is ready to be deployed. It’s the first of many, if the companies stick to their plan, which is to produce more than 1,000 bZ4X robotaxis this year. The bZ4X is one of the three autonomous vehicle models Pony.ai intends to use for commercial services in Tier 1 Chinese cities, including Beijing and Shanghai. The other two vehicles are already being used for Pony.ai’s ride-hailing service, while the bZ4X robotaxis will be gradually integrated into its fleet. Pony.ai’s goal is to operate...

item.title: Why ‘Starfleet Academy’ Brought Back a ‘Deep Space Nine’ Icon
item.description: 'Star Trek' and its love of long-lived species was the key to pulling together the new show's wonderful 'DS9' tribute.

item.title: 6 Best Gaming Laptops (2026): Tested and Reviewed
item.description: We tested the latest and greatest gaming laptops, and whittled our list down to the six absolute best you can buy right now.

item.title: Discord’s age verification mandate is a leap toward a gated internet
item.description: Discord is about to force some of the people who use its messaging app to make a choice: Use the platform with restricted features, or prove their age. It's a move that platforms have been slowly approaching, but Discord's teen-by-default rollout is a stronger clampdown that could offer a glimpse at an age-gated future on […]

item.title: Vibe coding Nothing’s apps is fun, until you try to make them useful
item.description: After a week vibe coding apps using Nothing's Essential Apps Builder, I'm conflicted. I buy into the smartphone maker's vision for software that adapts to you, not the other way around, but right now it doesn't deliver. It's hard to see how this goes from cool novelty to a reliable tool without serious refinement, and […]

item.title: Solarwinds WHD flaws exploited in attacks targeting servers and credentials
item.description: Two flaws are being actively used to target multiple organizations.

item.title: Target layoffs: Retail giant is slashing more jobs in 2026 as new CEO hopes to lift customer experience
item.description: Less than two weeks after Michael Fiddelke stepped into the top job, the company is making painful changes. Here’s what to know. Target Corporation has reportedly announced that it will cut about 500 roles at the company, partially in an effort to reallocate financial resources to boost the in-store customer experience.

item.description: Philips Hue has been busy upgrading several product lines recently, and the Lucca series is said to be next.

item.title: Spotify now has more than 750 million monthly users
item.description: Spotify announced Tuesday that it hit 751 million total monthly active users (MAUs) for quarter-four of 2025. That record-high is an 11 percent jump from the year before and a significant bump from the third quarter's 713 million MAUs. The quarterly earnings report also showed a 10 percent jump year-over-year in Premium subscribers, from 263 million to 290 million. Europe makes up the greatest number of the Swedish company's premium subscribers (36 percent), with North America coming second at 25 percent. Spotify contributes a few factors to its growth, including AI. "We consider ourselves t...

item.title: Zendure SolarFlow 2400 Pro et AC+ : tout savoir sur les nouvelles batteries solaires
item.description: On a fait 12 000 km pour voir où sont nées vos prochaines batteries. On était chez Zendure, en Chine à Shenzhen, pour le lancement de la nouvelle gamme SolarFlow : 2400 Pro, 2400 AC+ et 1600 AC+.

item.title: 4 Best Résumé Builders (2026), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Ditch the old Word doc that's hanging on by a thread. A proper résumé builder can help you stand out from the crowd.

item.description: I loved the Whoop 5.0, but found it far too expensive – which is why I'm all over this Presidents' Day Whoop 4.0 deal.

item.title: Riot Games lays off roughly half of its 2XKO development team despite the relative success of the free-to-play fighting game's launch
item.description: 2XKO's development team has been slashed in half despite launch success: 'overall momentum hasn’t reached the level needed to support a team of this size long term'.

item.title: RAM crisis got you down? Don't build a new PC — just get a pre-built system like this one instead
item.description: I've been building PCs for more than a decade, but it's time to hang up my thermal paste — RAM prices are out of control, so pre-built is now the way to go.

item.title: OpenAI a commencé à tester la publicité dans ChatGPT
item.description: ChatGPT, l’agent conversationnel d’intelligence artificielle (IA) le plus utilisé au monde, a commencé lundi à tester l’intégration de publicité, a indiqué l’américain OpenAI sur son blogue, une nouveauté qui devrait générer de nouveaux revenus dans une industrie très coûteuse.

item.title: Resident Evil Survival Unit devs wanted the mobile game to be 'objectively scary', so they monitored play testers' brainwaves
item.description: Resident Evil Survival Unit studio JOYCITY monitored play testers' brainwaves to ensure that the game was as scary as the mainline series.

item.title: Idéale pour les jeux AAA, cette tour PC gaming boostée à la RTX 5060 perd 300 € avec cette offre
item.description: Si vous êtes plus unité centrale que PC portable gamer, sachez qu'on vient de dénicher une belle pépite. Cdiscount propose actuellement la Lenovo LOQ Tower 17IRR9, dotée d'une bonne configuration, à 899,99 euros au lieu de 1 199,99 euros.

item.title: The Morning After: DOJ may face investigation over removal of ICE agent tracking apps
item.description: The House Judiciary Committee wants the US Department of Justice to turn over all its communications with both Apple and Google regarding the companies’ decisions to remove apps that shared information about sightings of US Immigration and Customs Enforcement officers. Several apps were removed from both Apple’s App Store and Google’s Play Store in October. Politico reported that Raskin has contacted Attorney General Pam Bondi. “The coercion and censorship campaign, which ultimately targets the users of ICE-monitoring applications, is a clear effort to silence this Administration’s critics and...

item.description: This Apple Watch Ultra 2 deal at Best Buy is the best Apple Watch deal we've seen so far, but there are plenty of alternatives depending on your needs.

item.title: Will Smith eating spaghetti was peak AI chaos in 2023 — now it shows how fast the tech has evolved
item.description: Three years of 'Will Smith eating spaghetti' videos reveal how dramatically AI video-generation has matured.

item.title: Waymo's vehicles are now fully driverless in Nashville
item.description: Waymo has gotten a step closer to offering robotaxi rides to the public in Nashville, Tennessee. The company the city and making sure they can operate as fully autonomous rides before launching a paid service in the location. Waymo announced that it was planning to bring its robotaxis to Nashville in September 2025, with the intention opening up rides to the public sometime this year. The company has been testing its technology in Nashville since then, but it has yet say when it’ll start accepting bookings for rides.The company conducts extensive testing in every new city before deploying its ...

item.title: Cette application IA populaire a exposé les conversations de 25 millions d’utilisateurs sur Internet
item.description: Une simple erreur de configuration a suffi à faire voler en éclats la vie privée de millions d’utilisateurs d’IA. L’app Chat & Ask AI, qui revendique plus de 50 millions d’utilisateurs sur Android et iOS, a en effet exposé les conversations de ses usagers sur Internet. Une base Firebase mal protégée est à l'origine de la fuite. Il s'agit d'une négligence courante qui touche des centaines d'applications....

item.title: RFK Jr. disregards science and facts. These STEM experts are fighting back by running for Congress
item.description: With the Trump administration politicizing expertise, a growing wave of doctors, health professionals, and even math teachers are turning to politics. To Dr. Richard Pan, a California-based pediatrician, the idea of living a long, healthy life should not be a partisan issue.

item.description: You can see Sammie's guitar—used by composer Ludwig Göransson to perform the film's score—as part of a new exhibit celebrating Ryan Coogler's Oscar contender.

item.description: Someone targeted a company operating multiple stalkerware apps and leaked names, email addresses, and partial payment card data.

item.title: Zillow CEO: ‘More than half of homebuyers cry during the process.’ AI can fix that
item.description: Zillow CEO Jeremy Wacksman shares how the housing affordability crisis has flipped the home-buying process—and how AI is going to transform it again. When Zillow launched 20 years ago, the home-buying process happened almost entirely offline. The company’s digital listings, combined with its innovative “Zestimate”—an estimate of a home’s value, based on the kind of data typically only available to real estate professionals—marked a turning point for the housing market. Zestimates weren’t exact representations of value, but they put power back in the hands of prospective buyers (to sellers’ and...

item.title: In one sentence, Amy Poehler sums up how boomers, Gen X, millennials, and Gen Z differ when it comes to money
item.description: Her podcast also broke down how each generation approaches work differently. “The boomers are all about money. Gen X is like, ‘is it all about money’? Millennials are like, ‘where is the money’? And Gen Z is like, ‘what is money’?”

item.title: Fini Snapdragon ? l’Exynos 2700 équiperait la moitié des Galaxy S27 de Samsung
item.description: Alors que le lancement des Galaxy S27 n'est pas attendu avant un long moment, Samsung accélère la cadence en lançant bientôt la production de la puce Exynos 2700. Une stratégie qui pourrait lui permettre de s'émanciper définitivement des processeurs de Qualcomm.

item.title: This new ad agency has a secret advantage, and it’s not what you think
item.description: The Ability Machine is run by a team of creatives with intellectual disabilities. The agency has already completed brand work for Mercedes and Kind. At the new ad agency Ability Machine in Nashville, creatives have access to a full suite of tools ranging from podcasting and photography studios to lighting equipment and design software. They also have quiet sensory rooms, dimmable lights, and a flexible seating system. Every part of the agency, from the way it tackles projects to the physical space it works from, is designed with its staff in mind, who are all adults with intellectual disabilit...

item.title: Idéale pour les vlogs grâce à son format de poche et sa qualité en 4K, la DJI Osmo Pocket 3 perd plus de 200 euros chez AliExpress
item.description: La DJI Osmo Pocket 3 est une action cam très pratique qui pourra se glisser facilement dans une poche pour immortaliser vos meilleurs souvenirs de vacances. Chez AliExpress, elle s'offre une remise de plus de 220 euros grâce à un code promo.
